zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期下行趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在12.8525美元附近交易，24小时内下跌1.87%。从价格走势看， AVAX在经历了短期的反弹后，似乎已进入下行通道，这表明市场情绪偏向悲观。投资者需密切关注价格是否会继续向下突破关键支撑位。

在技术指标方面，虽然RSI(14)数据缺失，但MACD显示出负值，表明卖压仍然较强。这种情况可能会导致进一步的价格回调，特别是在市场缺乏明确的买入信号时。SMA(20)位于13.08974，价格在其下方运行也支持了短期 bearish 的观点。

支撑位方面，12.8153美元是一个重要的心理支撑，若跌破该水平，可能会引发更多的卖盘，进而导致更深的调整。相对地，13.2095美元则构成了短期阻力位，若价格能够反弹并突破该点位，可能会重新吸引买入兴趣。

综合分析，建议投资者在当前市场环境下采取谨慎态度。短期内可考虑在支撑位附近寻找低吸机会，但需设定止损以应对潜在的下行风险。同时，密切关注市场动态，以便及时调整策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 12.8525, reflecting a 1.87% decline over the last 24 hours. This downward movement aligns with a broader market trend, suggesting a bearish sentiment among traders. The recent price action has established a high of 13.2095 and a low of 12.8153, indicating a consolidation phase. As the price approaches the lower boundary, it may attract buyers looking for value, while resistance remains at the recent high.

In terms of technical indicators, the SMA(20) at 13.08974 serves as a crucial reference point. The current price lies below this moving average, reinforcing the bearish outlook. The MACD shows a negative value at -0.0068737922, suggesting that selling pressure is still prevalent. However, without an available RSI reading, it is challenging to gauge the momentum fully. Traders should remain cautious, as a sustained move below the SMA could indicate further downside risk.

Support levels for AVAX can be identified around 12.8153, where previous buying interest may re-emerge. If this level fails to hold, it could open the door for a more significant decline towards the next psychological support near 12.50. Conversely, any attempt to break above the SMA(20) could signal a potential reversal, with targets set at the recent high of 13.2095. 

In light of the current market conditions, traders might consider short positions if the price breaks below the established support level. Conversely, a close above the SMA could offer a buying opportunity, ideally after confirming a shift in momentum through additional indicators. Maintaining a disciplined approach with stop-loss orders will be essential in navigating the inherent volatility of AVAX/USD.
